infotexts.entitydescription.it_spoon: A crude but efficient surgical device, designed to be used in a rush, inflicts great pain.
infotexts.entitydescription.it_eyedrop: A moisturizing agent for the eyes, experts believe it may have healing properties.
infotexts.entitydescription.it_lasersurgerytool: An advanced eye surgery tool that requires a high amount of skill to operate.
infotexts.entitydescription.it_eyeconnector: A gooey muscle-nerve tissue that rapidly replicates and attaches to eyes.
infotexts.entitydescription.it_humaneye: A single human eye, who did it come from?
infotexts.entitydescription.it_plasticeye: An improvised plastic "eye", looks more like a ball.
infotexts.entitydescription.it_enhancedeye: A single human eye, enhanced by electronics and capable of utilizing vision enhancing lenses.
infotexts.entitydescription.it_cybereye: A state-of-the-art cybereye, durable but expensive, capable of utilizing vision enhancing lenses.
infotexts.entitydescription.it_crawlereye: An eye belonging to a very unfortunate crawler. May trigger unwanted effects.
infotexts.entitydescription.it_mudraptoreye: A purple malformed eye, belongs to a mudraptor.
infotexts.entitydescription.it_hammerheadeye: A resilient eye from a hammerhead, smells like salmon.
infotexts.entitydescription.it_huskifiedeye: An abomination of an eye, mutated beyond recognition by the husk parasite, may infect the patient.
infotexts.entitydescription.it_watchereye: A red blob harvested from the Watcher, it has the necessary nerve endings to provide vision. Did anyone else hear that noise?
infotexts.entitydescription.it_charybdiseye: An eye belonging to the mighty Charybdis, experts do not recommend transplanting it.
infotexts.entitydescription.it_latchereye: An eye belonging to the mighty Latcher, experts do not recommend transplanting it.
infotexts.entitydescription.it_organiclens: A pair of organic lenses used in treating cataracts.
infotexts.entitydescription.it_medicallens: Lenses that act as a scanner and provides visual enhancements for medics. ‖color:120,200,120‖ Press F on a limb to scan.‖color:end‖ ‖color:200,200,120‖ Press F to turn on/off.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.it_electricallens: Lenses that act as an electrical goggle and help engineers distinguish circuits. ‖color:200,200,120‖ Press F to turn on/off.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.it_nightlens: Lenses that enhance vision in the dark. ‖color:200,200,120‖ Press F to turn on/off.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.it_thermallens: Lenses with integrated infrared-vision. ‖color:200,200,120‖ Press F to turn on/off.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.it_glasses: An outdated device used to relieve vision-impairment.
infotexts.entitydescription.it_aviators: An ancient accessory that is said to be only used by commanders of airships. Gives a lot of confidence.
infotexts.entitydescription.it_nvg: Coalition standard night vision goggles. Requires batteries.
infotexts.entitydescription.it_eyejar: A jar that utilizes stem cell regeneration to mend eyes slowly. Can be placed on the ground.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sr_removedeyes: Eyes of this patient have been removed, they can't see at all.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sr_removedeye: This patient is missing an eye, impairing their vision.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sr_heldlid: Eye lids of this patient are held open. Very uncomfortable.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sr_poppedeye: Eyes of this patient are popped out! A truly traumatizing experience.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sr_eyeconnector: A gooey substance seems to be applied to the eye holes of this patient.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sr_corneaincision: Cornea of this patient is cut open.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sr_emulsification: Eye lenses of this patient are removed, greatly impairing their vision.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sr_eyedrops: This patient has very well moisturized eyes, they seem to be healing faster.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sr_lasersurgery: This patient has undergone laser surgery and their eyes are rapidly healing.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.mc_deadeyes: Eyes of this patient look flat and unresponsive.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.mc_deadeye: An eye of this patient is flat and unresponsive, it should be removed to prevent retinopathy.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.mc_retinopathy: Immune system of this patient has detected eye tissue and is attacking it! Eye removal or immunosuppressants are required!
infotexts.afflictiondescription.mc_cataract: This patient has blurred and gray vision.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.mc_visionsickness: This patient is vision-sick after eye surgery.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.mc_mismatch: Different types of eyes this patient has are causing confusion and headaches.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.vi_cyber: This patient has fully-synthetic cyber eyes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.vi_human: This patient has regular eyes belonging to a human.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.vi_plastic: This patient has balls of plastic where their eyes should be. Pity.

Override.multiscalpel.speedflex: Mode active: Adaptive organ extraction. Use on head for brain and eyes, left arm for kidneys, torso for liver, right arm for heart, left leg for lungs.
